name: Dungeons & Dragons 3.5 Edition
description: The revised third edition of the world's most popular fantasy role-playing game, featuring the d20 system.

core_mechanics.armor_class: 10 + Dex modifier + armor bonus + shield bonus + other modifiers

character_creation.class: Select a class that defines your character's abilities
character_creation.ability_scores: Roll 4d6, drop lowest, or use point buy system
character_creation.skills: Allocate skill points based on class and intelligence
character_creation.feats: Gain feats at 1st level and every 3rd level thereafter
character_creation.hit_points: Roll hit die + Constitution modifier per level

supported_features: Skill checks with ranks and synergy bonuses
Combat with full attack actions and attacks of opportunity
